title: Create Script and Define Cast Of Characters
purpose: Describe the core function Create Script and Define Cast Of Characters.
guardrails: Do not select or negotiate with actual talent; only define role specifications and desired characteristics
Maintain confidentiality of character information and plot details
Ensure the script adheres to content guidelines
Keep drafts versioned and track changes for transparency
Avoid over‑writing; maintain concise dialogue and narrative aligned with the premise
Use standard screenplay formatting throughout all drafts
Document influences and sources ethically and avoid plagiarism

tasks.title: Expand the premise into a full narrative outline
tasks.description: Execute the task: Expand the premise into a full narrative outline.

deliverables.description: A comprehensive narrative outline detailing scene beats, setups, anticipations, reversals and transitions.

acceptance.text: Covers all major plot points and scene beats.
Includes notes on setups, anticipations, reversals and transitions.
Aligns with the approved premise from E1.

tasks.title: Write the script
tasks.description: Execute the task: Write the script.

deliverables.description: The initial full script written in standard screenplay format, including scenes and dialogues.

acceptance.text: Completes the full narrative in standard screenplay formatting.
Scenes and dialogue reflect the narrative outline.
Includes descriptions of world and characters.

tasks.title: Organize the writing process
tasks.description: Execute the task: Organize the writing process.

deliverables.description: A beat outline document tracking each story beat and mapping to finished pages, capturing version history.

acceptance.text: Lists each story beat and corresponding draft pages.
Tracks version revisions and status of each beat.
Organized for easy updates and retrieval.

deliverables.description: A sheet containing bios for each major character, summarizing personality, story purpose and number of appearances.

acceptance.text: Each character includes personality summary, story purpose and appearance count.
Bios align with the narrative outline.
Format is consistent across all entries.

tasks.title: Define potential casting profiles and specifications
tasks.description: Execute the task: Define potential casting profiles and specifications.

deliverables.description: A list of potential actors for each role, with casting criteria and brief justification.

acceptance.text: Provides at least three candidate actors per role.
Includes casting criteria such as age, look, talent and budget.
Aligns with character descriptions and production budget.
